title: Pronouns Menu
desc: How would you prefer to be referred? Select your pronouns in this menu and everyone will know what to call you!

roles.name: She/Her
roles.description: For those who prefer to be referred to with she/her pronouns.

roles.name: He/Him
roles.description: For those who prefer to be referred to with he/him pronouns.

roles.name: They/Them
roles.description: For those who prefer to be referred to with they/them pronouns.

roles.name: It/Its
roles.description: For those who prefer to be referred to with it/its pronouns.

roles.name: Fae/Faer
roles.description: For those who prefer to be referred to with fae/faer pronouns.

roles.name: Xe/Xem
roles.description: For those who prefer to be referred to with xe/xem pronouns.

roles.name: Other / Ask
roles.description: For those who have pronouns not in this list.
